00022 #if !defined(XERCESC_INCLUDE_GUARD_XMLFILEMGR_HPP)
00023 #define XERCESC_INCLUDE_GUARD_XMLFILEMGR_HPP
00024 
00025 #include <xercesc/util/XercesDefs.hpp>
00026 #include <xercesc/util/XMemory.hpp>
00027 
00028 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00029 
00030 typedef void* FileHandle;
00031 #define XERCES_Invalid_File_Handle 0
00032 
00033 //  Abstract class for files. This is be used to allow multiple file handling implementations.
00034 class XMLFileMgr : public XMemory
00035 {
00036     public:
00037         XMLFileMgr() {}
00038         virtual ~XMLFileMgr() {}
00039 
00040         // File access
00041         virtual FileHandle  fileOpen(const XMLCh* path, bool toWrite, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00042         virtual FileHandle  fileOpen(const char* path, bool toWrite, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00043         virtual FileHandle  openStdIn(MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00044         
00045         virtual void        fileClose(FileHandle f, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00046         virtual void        fileReset(FileHandle f, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00047 
00048         virtual XMLFilePos  curPos(FileHandle f, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00049         virtual XMLFilePos  fileSize(FileHandle f, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00050 
00051         virtual XMLSize_t   fileRead(FileHandle f, XMLSize_t byteCount, XMLByte* buffer, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00052         virtual void        fileWrite(FileHandle f, XMLSize_t byteCount, const XMLByte* buffer, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00053         
00054         // Ancillary path handling routines
00055         virtual XMLCh*      getFullPath(const XMLCh* const srcPath, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00056         virtual XMLCh*      getCurrentDirectory(MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00057         virtual bool        isRelative(const XMLCh* const toCheck, MemoryManager* const manager) = 0;
00058 };
00059 
00060 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE_END
00061 
00062 #endif
